description.displayText: Susan is a smart capable compassionate caregiver. We have known her for over 10 years and feel 100% confident recommending her as a responsible eldercare, childcare or baby care resource. She is uniquely qualified and comes with a healthy dose of common sense. Unafraid of hard work, Susan will do what needs to be done without any fuss or hesitation.
